When you press Finish, the following will occur:

  • Your settings will be placed in the catalog
  • Your products will be put in the database
  • Your content pages will be created
  • The secure web server will be enabled (optional until launch)
  • Sample customers and order data will be put in the database (optional)

At that point you may begin testing by following the Preview link, and changing the configuration with Interchange's administration tool.

After you are satisfied with your catalog, you can launch and begin taking orders.
